
		<h1 class="postTitle">
			<a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/TotheAnts/p/18709607" title="发布于 2025-02-11 16:39">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">本地部署 Browser-Use WebUI + 本地部署 DeepSeek 实现浏览器AI自动化</span>
    

</a>

		</h1>
		<div class="clear"></div>
		<div class="postBody">
			<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h1><span style="font-size: 16px">前一版采用的是 Deepseek 官方API，由于最近比较火，可能遇到服务器繁忙导致运行不成功，这一版选择通过 Ollama 本地部署的模型</span></h1>
<h1 id="JPUE-1739253115337">一、安装部署（已安装 python3.11 或以上版本、playwright）</h1>
<h2 id="LWcc-1739253132401">1.下载最新源码包（v1.4及以上版本），解压</h2>
<div><a href="https://github.com/browser-use/web-ui/releases" rel="noopener nofollow">https://github.com/browser-use/web-ui/releases</a></div>
<div>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1692366/202502/1692366-20250211135224794-989340000.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2 id="zP0F-1739253153270">2.在解压的文件夹中打开CMD，安装依赖项</h2>
<div>pip install -r requirements.txt</div>
<div>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1692366/202502/1692366-20250211135252181-1264975782.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2 id="OI9D-1739253183259">3.安装 Ollama，运行 deepseek-r1<a><br></a></h2>
<div>模型大小很重要：更大的模型效果非常好！较小的模型可能无法提供最佳体验，因此建议坚持使用较大的模型，如 deepseek-r1:14b</div>
<div>ollama run deepseek-r1:14b</div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<h2 id="pMfO-1739253183268">4.启动（启动前关闭所有chorme）</h2>
<div>python webui.py --ip 127.0.0.1 --port 8888</div>






</div>
<div>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1692366/202502/1692366-20250211135328058-2013321631.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2 id="l1gj-1739253220364">5.访问</h2>
<div>浏览器打开这个链接：<a href="http://127.0.0.1:7788" rel="noopener nofollow">http://127.0.0.1:8888</a></div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<h1 id="TFXL-1739253220373">二、WebUI 配置</h1>
<h2 id="xkDx-1739253220375">1.Agent Settings</h2>
<div>这是一个关键步骤：取消选中“Use Vision”并将“Max Actions per Step”设置为 1</div>






</div>
<div>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1692366/202502/1692366-20250211135356724-13321928.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2 id="kNRQ-1739253257682">2.LLM Configuration</h2>
<div>LLM Provider 选择 ollama ，模型选择 deepseek-r1:14b</div>
<div>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1692366/202502/1692366-20250211135424921-1798625203.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<div><span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">注：可手动修改成本地部署的其他模型的 NAME</span></div>
<div><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1692366/202502/1692366-20250211171628871-1849159305.png" alt="0" width="482" height="169" data-media-type="image"></div>
<div>&nbsp;</div>
<h2 id="SICK-1739253273310">3.Browser Settings</h2>
<div>根据需要修改</div>
<div>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1692366/202502/1692366-20250211135442360-686175117.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2 id="D9SN-1739253291159">4.Run Agent</h2>
<div>录入任务描述，运行</div>
<div>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1692366/202502/1692366-20250211173233666-2044114754.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1692366/202502/1692366-20250211173006625-575843582.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>






</div>






</div>






</div>






</div>






</div>
</div>
<div class="clear"></div>
